import React, { Component } from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import Book from './Book' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' class ListBookShelfs extends Component{ static propTypes = { currently_reading: PropTypes.array.isRequired, want_to_read: PropTypes.array.isRequired, read: PropTypes.array.isRequired, updateShelf:PropTypes.func.isRequired } redirectToSearch = () => { this.props.history.push(`/search`) } render (){ const { currently_reading,want_to_read,read,updateShelf} = this.props //let showing_currently_reading, showing_want_to_read,showing_read return(

MyReads

Currently Reading

    {currently_reading.map((book) => ( ))}

Want to Read

    {want_to_read.map((book) => ( ))}

    {read.map((book) => ( ))}
) } } export default ListBookShelfs
